snippet.title: Stitch's Escape Game - Full Playthrough
snippet.description:
““Stitch’s Escape Game” was released on the Disney World website in 2004, just before the opening of the Stitch’s Great Escape attraction. In our deep dive, we discovered that little to no footage of the game was available online. To preserve it from potentially becoming lost media, we recorded the full game and its bonus features on an old Windows 7 system.

Join us as we explore this rare piece of Lilo & Stitch history, diving into a nostalgic 2000s Disney game that many thought was lost to time.

If you would like a copy of the print-out reward decoder, you can find it here:
https://t.ly/Y56tL

---

0:00:00 The Main Game
0:07:11 Easy
0:10:06 Medium
0:13:44 Hard
0:18:31 Screenmate Functions
